duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare items for assembly line and assist in setting up Meals on Wheels tray line.
Store patient care food items and ensure proper covering, dating, and labeling.
Clean tray line, steam tables, food warmers, and refrigerators as well as the floor after meal service.
Maintain physical demands such as walking, carrying, pushing/pulling, twisting, bending, reaching, wrist position deviation, and fine motor activities.
Meet occasional physical demands including sitting, climbing, reaching overhead, squatting/kneeling/crawling, and keyboard use/repetitive motion.
Handle continuous physical demands such as standing, talking, and lifting heavy weights up to 50 lbs.
Adhere to company policies regarding onboarding process, annual flu vaccine, and protection of personal information.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED preferred.
